item.title: Traffic light severely damaged, 13th August
item.description:
The traffic light pole has been smashed sideways. It is at a severe angle and the lamps and wires are dangling from it. The light was fine yesterday (12/08/2025) so must have occurred in the last 24 hour (now 9 am 13/08/2025).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albany Road, Walworth, London
